---
title: UsbmuxdApi.usbmuxd_set_socket_type method
---

Sets the socket type (Unix socket or TCP socket) libusbmuxd should use when connecting to usbmuxd.

```csharp
public virtual int usbmuxd_set_socket_type(int value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | SOCKET_TYPE_UNIX or SOCKET_TYPE_TCP |

## Return Value

0 on success or negative on error
